name: Ninja's Trial
description:
It took me five days to finish this game, but it only took you less than five minutes to finish it. We aren't the same! -ME, 2022-

You play as ninja on his graduation test?

Control:

KeyFuctionTabToggle FullscreenArrow KeysMovement (walk)ZConfirm / Attack / Interacthold X Increase walk speed

Assets and tools used:

  • LDtk by Deepnight
  • LDtk to Unity by Cammnin
  • Dotween by Demigiant
  • Node Canvas by Paradox Notion
  • Text Animator by Fabucci
  • Ninja adventure's's sprites & BGMs by Pixelboy
  • Matchmaker SFX s
